label: A3B7C2_tP48_136_fj_2eghj_j-001
title: Tetragonal Ba$_{3}$Zr$_{2}$S$_{7}$ Structure
comments:
The ICSD says the prototype of this structure is \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B7CD2_tP48_136_j_2efhj_g_j-001}{SrTb$_{2}$Fe$_{2}$O$_{7}$}, but the structures are in fact quite different so we place this structure in its own prototype. 
 This is the low temperature form of Ba$_{3}$Zr$_{2}$S$_{7}$, with data apparently taken at room temperature, though the ICSD entry says it was taken at 153K.  At higher temperatures the structure becomes \href{current_web_home_dir/A3B7C2_oC48_66_el_f2gl_l-001}{orthorhombic}.
